p: The results of refractive index, specific gravity and color of essential oil obtained by HD and MAHD are shown in Table 2. No significant differences were observed between treatments (P > 0.05). The only difference in the color of the MAHD essential oil was compared with the HD treatment, which was completely colorless. Karakaya et al. (2012) obtained the specific gravity of rosemary essential oil extracted by HD and MAHD methods, 0.875 and 0.879, respectively. The refractive indexes of both essential oils were identical (1.465).
